ygData.subject: Quest Items?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently looted some mobs and have recieved the following items which I +ACo-think+ACo- maybe for quests, but I don t have info on who or what they are for:
ygData.messageBody:
I recently looted some mobs and have recieved the following items which I
+ACo-think+ACo- maybe for quests, but I don't have info on who or what they are for:

Mallet Head
Mallet Handle
Metal Disk

I got the first two in Befallen, the other somewhere in North Ro I think...
Can't remember...

Please let me know if you know of anything they are for? I cannot use them
(as far as I know) and the first two items I cannot even sell...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
